t: Identifying a scam - Amazon Customer Service
s: Impersonation scams are perpetrated ... even by messaging you on social media. Scammers aim to have you make a payment of some kind, share personal information, or give them access to your computer. They do so by pretending to be a well-known organization with whom you've likely engaged. Impersonation scams can be difficult to identify. Here are some red flags indicating ...
